titleStmt.title: The conflict of Iob By way of dialogue. Compiled for illustration, or opening of that great encounter: and may also serue as a paraphrase vpon that heauenly worke. By R.H.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iaggard dwelling in Barbican, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A paraphrase and commentary on the Book of Job.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
